snippet.title: Wizards Of Nature - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Wizards Of Nature is an open-world, first-person, fantasy RPG game. Coming soon...

Explore and Recover the fallen Cities of Ziran while defeating terrible monsters of different shapes and sizes that the Necromancer left behind, level up by executing the best moves through your tactics by combining the use of Magic in battles.

The Kingdom of Ziran, where there were many joyful inhabitants who lived in harmony with the extraordinary nature that surrounded them, was devastated when one of the Wizards in Elron City corrupted, bringing chaos and destruction to all who lived there...

With each passing day, time was running out for the people of Ziran, all attempts to recover the Kingdom's territories were in vain and there were no other options but to send the best Wizards to die in this already lost battle.

Christopher, a retired Ice Class Wizard, knowing that things couldn't stay like this, decided to risk everything by dumping the hope of the Kingdom's salvation on a little Young Wizard. Even without any training, this Young Wizard is of a Rare, Legendary and very Powerful Class...

Together, they’ll go on different missions that will be part of the training to prepare the Young Wizard for the great battle against the “Necromancer”: The Corrupted Mage, responsible for the destruction of the Kingdom of Ziran.

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THE GAME HERE:
https://williamjacobproductions.com/wizardsofnature
